name: SwapTestEngine718
description:
CONTROLS TUTORIAL

  • Move with wasd, zoom with mouse wheel
  • L-shift to use ability, lmb to use primary weapon
  • Pick items up with E
  • Use _dispenser_ to buy things and _wave_trigger_ to start waves
  • Esc to enter pause menu
  • _volume_ to change sounds volume and pitch
  • _water_ to change water color processing speed (lower to increase performance)
  • _exit_ to close the game and delete all saved data
  • _save_ to not delete all saved data when exiting
